title: Is Overwatch worth buy?
body:
I heard it was fun, I heard it sucked. Is it really worth to pay $60.00 for this game, or I'm just dumping my money in the dumpster for a game that won't even last, or stay excited?

PS: Can anyone list me a very fun game that's out in 2016 that I can play. I prefer MMORPG's, paid or free. A game that evolves around playing with people and not solo missions. Doesn't have to be MMORPG's, can be any game, but I prefer that it is.
